summary.title: Summary
summary.description:
Summary
Have a good day. I specialize in professionally creating user interface design and development. Throughout my professional career, I have designed numerous products, with some of them becoming flagship products for companies. My experience primarily focuses on visually processing big volumes of data, as I have dedicated a significant portion of my professional activity to the financial sector. My work involves turning complex into straightforward ones. I have been in the industry for over 12 years and hold a Bachelor of Computer Science degree, which allows me to delve deeper into the technical aspects of products. Additionally, I am proficient in product development as a software engineer. If you are interested in my experience, then contact me.

list.description:
• Make user experience and interfaces for all stages and scenarios of product growth let to make Road Map, which accelerated the release of MVP by 1 month earlier.
  • Prototyping and animating the UI allowed us to conduct UX research, which showed an increase in usability and speed of task solving of 34% compared to competitors' solutions.

• Based on conducted user experience research. A more responsive and user-friendly interface for bank products has been made, which has increased the number of customers by 25%.
  • Maintained and developed the UI-Kit.

• Created UX and UI of the trading terminal application for iOS and Android. Subsequently, this product contributed more than 50% of profits and became the company's flagship product.
  • Based on user research, I made a UI dashboard for the companyâ€™s marketing activities. Which let to reduce the budget and increase advertising efficiency by 30%

• Participation in the creation of a data collection and analysis system, which showed a performance increase of more than 50% compared to the previous version.
  • Engaged in the development of algorithms for calculating data for university MIPT
• Created more than 1K+ promotional sites and advertising banners. Which was increases the company's performance from 10% to 40% from year to year.
